replies.body:
HA! you wish 

#A PUNCH FROM AN INSECT LIKE YOU IS LITTLE MORE THAN A SCRATCH ON MY ARMOR
Nothing better then tilting Vi mains by canceling their Q with yours.
Nothing better then tilting sion mains by never letting him use his q in a fight.
If you are making sure Sion is not able to use Q in a fight, he's doing his job.
I have my e, I was using him as a way to aoe down his whole team
Vi, I thought that was clear
If my teammates are close enough to be E'd through me, please tell me because that would be really creepy of them :D

not really considering q is a knockback. if you are far enough away to where that's not happening then you as a sion are already not helping. again, I'm vi. you need to be pretty much on top of your squishies to be helping them.
*waiting for Glory in Death Vi x Sion comment*
You can say what you want, but they do have the best _ViSion_

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-0mnj1RJQDOY/Vfjfg1-u7WI/AAAAAAAAADc/-C4mnhMoCBM/w506-h750/Jock%2BVi-sion.jpg

This is the only one I could find...sorry.
I did that the other day, it pretty much ended the same way as well. sion got obliterated.
